body: I'm beginning to wonder why God put us on the Earth....

Meh, not really. The infringing of their human rights and treating them like animals made solely for sex is WHAT I find appealing. I don't care about the rest of that shit. It's about asserting dominance and having full control over another being.

Meh, not really. Infringing upon human rights is far too easy, and thus boring. Consensual masochism is where the real challenge lies because you're pushing women to their utmost limits without directly forcing it upon them... you'd be surprised just how far a lot of them are willing to go, purely on their own terms... ;)
@tyler367 i agree, though thats how women should be treated irl in my opinion

I prefer infringing human rights personally. lol
When I'm in hentai fantasy land, women aren't human anyway. They are sex objects/pets/slaves/sluts/etc.

god bless this fucked up work. also @kirbi i like to believe it's a program based either on volunteering or someone picking up that you're interested in it. i'd rather it be the former to be honest, consensual masochism > infringing human rights.
So I guess she got chosen because of what she said in public?
